title: Godly Finance: Wisdom of the Ancients
description: A book that strikes a practical balance between Financial Principals and biblical wisdom as shared within the bible. When learning about finances you will find that there are some distinct differences in how the world views finances and how the word of God views finances. How do we learn about finances and sort through the differences between God’s word and the world views on what is best? A practical guide on how to apply God’s wisdom on finances in our lives by learning how to find balance with the worldly wisdom by sifting it through the lens of God’s word.
author: Lance Dickson
